price: 34. (Malamu) baya na makambo mosusu ezala lokola yango, soki ya soló, bazali na bosembo.
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
